issue.title: Compiling drcsim against gazebo default branch produces very low real time factor

message.raw:
@scpeters tracked it down to repeatedly failing name lookups for collision bodies with the suffix `_collision`; the new parser was using the suffix `_geom` instead.

Fixed by reverting the parser to use `_collision` in two places:

* pull request #612 fixes gazebo/default
* [sdformat pull request #11](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/11) fixes sdformat/1.4
message.html:
@scpeters tracked it down to repeatedly failing name lookups for collision bodies with the suffix _collision; the new parser was using the suffix _geom instead.

Fixed by reverting the parser to use _collision in two places:

  • pull request #612 fixes gazebo/default
  • sdformat pull request #11 fixes sdformat/1.4
